meanings.sent1: The puzzle pieces were incorporable, fitting together perfectly.
meanings.sent2: The new software was incorporable with the existing system.
meanings.sent3: The ingredients were incorporable in the recipe, creating a delicious dish.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were incorporable into the project, enhancing its success.

meanings.definition: Able to be combined or included.
meanings.sent1: The various flavors were incorporable into the ice cream, creating a unique taste.
meanings.sent2: Different perspectives were incorporable in the discussion, enriching the conversation.
meanings.sent3: The toys were incorporable in the game, adding an element of fun.
meanings.sent4: Her talents were incorporable into the team, making it stronger.
meanings.sent5: The ingredients were incorporable, making the dish flavorful and satisfying.
